title: INTORE a short novel by Kriztofer Plitzkin
description:
INTORE is a short novel by author Kriztofer Plitzkin. 


A spiritual hardboiled, neo western set in modern Africa.

A former legionnary who has settled down in Sweden returns to an African country he knows very well, when a dear friend is framed and imprisoned for child abuse.
The former legionnary gathers two brothers in arms a Frenchman and a Britt, to settle a score with corrupt authorities, investigate a dark set up and break their friend out of jail in a violent operation.

INTORE is the epic debut novel of Kriztofer Plitzkin and the first volume in a series of three based on the same character.

This pdf version is the free downloadable version of this short novel to enjoy to anyone so inclined.

The ILLUSTRATED VERSION is on the way and is definitely worth a few bucks. 
Show some love and support !
